english.segment1: Power thunder, lightning bolts. Rushing wind, a waterfall. Babies' cry, a mother's tears. Humming river, rustling leaves
english.segment2: CHORUS: He's calling loud and clearly. He's saying "Won't you hear Me". We see Him everywhere. And still we roll on by
english.segment3: Winter snow, a fire's warmth. Summer's day a cold heart turns. Peaceful place, a helping hand. Kindly words, a smiling face
english.segment5: He was God but one of us. A king who had a servants heart. Born to die so we might live. His reason was His Father's will
